positions.subtitle: SG Analytics
positions.description: Experienced in preparing initiation report, earnings report, weekly, daily report, preparing news inflow with regards to key events , company and sector reports , maintaining and regularly updating databases and newsletters  Assisted in preparation of valuations for mergers & acquisitions (M&A) transactions by performing detailed due diligence on target companies to determine fair value using a variety of financial models, including discounted cash flow analysis, multiples, and comparable company analyses (public comparable and transactions)  Worked on multiple buy-side and sell-side assignments including preparation of detailed pitchbooks, target/buyer identification, management presentation and industry research in Technology and Consumer sectors  Supported client in various Fintech and Digital asset company deals, including preparing a PIB, CIM, management presentation, investor presentation
positions.title: Associate Analyst -IB Research
positions.description_html:
Experienced in preparing initiation report, earnings report, weekly, daily report, preparing news inflow with regards to key events , company and sector reports , maintaining and regularly updating databases and newsletters
 Assisted in preparation of valuations for mergers & acquisitions (M&A) transactions by performing detailed due diligence on target companies to determine fair value using a variety of financial models, including discounted cash flow analysis, multiples, and comparable company analyses (public comparable and transactions)
 Worked on multiple buy-side and sell-side assignments including preparation of detailed pitchbooks, target/buyer identification, management presentation and industry research in Technology and Consumer sectors
 Supported client in various Fintech and Digital asset company deals, including preparing a PIB, CIM, management presentation, investor presentation

experience.title: (Former Christensen IR) Financial Analyst - Researcher
